entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who is trying to open an egg.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is present in the scene and grins guiltily when she hears Harry muttering.

entities.name: lee
entities.description: Someone who passes an egg to Harry.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is present in the scene and bellowed at the noise.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: A ghost mentioned as having a musical saw orchestra at his deathday party.

relationships.description: Harry has the egg and is trying to open it.
Hermione is present in the scene with Harry.
Lee passed the egg to Harry.
Fred reacted to the noise by covering his ears.
